channel.title: Creating a JAR file
channel.description:
[code]C:\Users\Austin\Documents\Rofl-Scape Client>java -jar client.jar Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: RunClient Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: RunClient at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: RunClient. Program will exit.[/code]
In my client, I have the run.batch file named "~Run". What do I do to fix this? Thanks.

item.title: Creating a JAR file
item.dc:creator: @wartek wartek
item.description:
@wartek wrote:

I think you didn’t set yout java environment variables.
Here is a tut how to do it http://vietpad.sourceforge.net/javaonwindows.html.
NOTE:Its only for windows.
I can be wrong but try it, hopefully it helps :/.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a JAR file
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

C:\Users\Austin\Documents\Rofl-Scape Client>java -jar client.jar Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: RunClient Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: RunClient at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: RunClient. Program will exit.

In my client, I have the run.batch file named “~Run”. What do I do to fix this? Thanks.
